name: Best Western Hotel Armando

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: We booked this hotel based on the other Tripadvisor reviews. When we arrived at the hotel we were disappointed to see a building site next door, moreover we could hear grinding of stone and building work loudly. After opening our window we also discovered our room was directly opposite this, so I subsequently went downstairs to the reception to see if they could move us to another room away from the noise. To my astonishment the man at the desk denied there was any building noise going on at that time - this whilst speaking to him all I could hear was loud drilling and grinding. As it transpired we were not in the hotel room much during the day time but the building work started promptly at 8am to around 5pm during our stay. It would have been nice to have been pre-warned about the building works prior to our stay or even an apology for the inconvenience caused.
reviews.title: Modern hotel,central location,but a couple of negatives...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was very modern and clean and appeared to have nice fittings. However, when we went to brush our teeth the water from the basin leaked everywhere all over the bathroom floor. On closer inspection the pipes were not even connected. The plug on the bath which was a modern style was broken and unable to be used. Unfortunately some of the nice modern fittings hadn’t been fitted properly which was a shame! I mentioned these problems to the same man at the desk, he said they would be fixed, but nothing was done. With it not being fixed for that day, we mentioned it again to the young girl at the desk before breakfast and by the time we returned to the hotel the basin was repaired. This same girl proved to be more friendly and accommodating.
reviews.title: What a great find!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Had it not been for these aforementioned problems we would have given higher ratings.
reviews.title: Well worth a visit

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in Armando for only one night, but it was great. Good location, nice and clean rooms, great shower. We got a great recommendation for dinner from the young man in the reception.
reviews.title: Worth a Longer Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I the morning we had to leave at 6 am to catch a flight, and naturally missed breakfast so another nice member of the staff offered us coffee and yogurts before calling us a taxi, what I thought was very nice.
reviews.title: Great value in town centre.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a spacious, well furnished, and clean room, and everything worked. Plenty of space in the bathroom, plenty of hangars in the cupboard, well lit.
reviews.title: Jolly good

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: We arrived earlier than the official check in time, and were given a room immediately, following a call from the front desk to the maid.
reviews.title: Great stay!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The only niggle we had is that when all guests arrive simultaneously for the (very good) breakfast, some will have a bit of a wait, as there aren't enough tables. But don't let this put you off a super little hotel.
reviews.title: ideal location but discreet

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A great location too - 5 minutes' walk from the Arena.
reviews.title: Top location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed with our three daughters for a few days in hotel Armando in july 2011. It is a great hotel! We loved staying there! The hotel is perfectly located for exploring the city. The rooms are very clean and large with a perfectly working airco; even the three-bedroom for our teenage girls was perfect. Breakfast was very good with lots of variety. The staff is very friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: Great hotel close to historic centre

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I just completed a 4 night stay at Hotel Armando (Best Western) in Verona, having chosen the hotel based on the reviews on Tripadvisor. We were not disappointed. The hotel was spotlessly clean, in a quiet but still very central location in the Historic District, and a 5 minute walk from the Arena. We loved the fact that we were so close to the major attractions but also that we could leave them behind and after 5 minutes get back to our quiet neighbourhood and leave the noisy and busy central streets behind. Our room was so clean, and the bed was really comfortable. Breakfast each day was just what you need - cereals, various breads and croissants, fresh fruit, yoghurt, cold cuts, cakes and pastries, juices, teas and coffee. And eggs you could boil as well. You don't need to worry about whether you can start your day with enough fuel in your tank! We have to mention Antonello, who was always there to help and could not have provided better service. His recommendation of an historic restaurant for dinner on our last evening enabled us to have an experience that will remain wth us for many years to come. Finally, for what we received this hotel represented excellent value for money.,
reviews.title: Clean, safe, hospitable and great value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled on business
reviews.text: My second stay on business. The location is central (in the old city) but quiet. From the outside it has character, more so than your average Best Western anyway. Inside it is clean, modern and comfortable. The WiFi is good and free. The staff are pleasant and the breakfast was fine. Can't agree with others about the restaurant next door, it's a friendly, family type place but the food was mediocre in my opinion.
reviews.title: Nice location, good for the price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here only 1 night, however we think it's a good value, it's located only about 5 min walk to the Arena de Verona and Piazza Bra. Room was a bit small, however very modern and nicely decorated, loved the shower!
reviews.title: Nice little hotel, very close to the arena di Verona

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011
reviews.text: Wi -fi worked fine, and it was included in the price, as well as the breakfast, which was basic but good.
reviews.title: Old but Comfortable and Good Value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011
reviews.text: We took a taxi to and from the train station, it was 10 euros, and it takes 5 minutes to get there. Would definitely go back and recommend this hotel.
reviews.title: Loved it.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel Armando was a welcomed departure from the over-priced and old-ish hotels we stayed in during our week-long vacation in Italy. Our room was clean and modern, and we had a comfortable night's rest. The best part for me was the shower, spacious with generous water flow, which was refreshing after a hot day walking around Verona.
reviews.title: Great value - highly recommended

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled with family
reviews.text: There was free wifi, which I discovered was a not a norm for hotels in Italy - that was a major plus for me. There was also free minibar, which was a nice surprise.
reviews.title: Indifferent - us and them

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were very pleased with the breakfast spread. Service was prompt and the front desk was always ready to answer our questions.
reviews.title: Good location, modern, comfortable room

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: On the flipside, the rooms are quite small and it's a bit of a walk to Piazza delle Erbe. But it's very close to the Arena and a short cab ride from the train station.
reviews.title: So Clean

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I'll highly recommend this hotel if you're making a short trip to Verona.
reviews.title: Surprisingly good

description: Completely refurbished, the hotel provides a peaceful environment in which to rest after a busy day, offering its clients a family atmosphere and modern services, including wireless Internet connection throughout the building, Internet point and bar.The hotel also has rooms accessible to disabled guests.
